This application let you to enjoy our interactive gardens on the way you experienced never before. I would like to invite you to take a tour through application with me.

Map displaying locations of interactive places supported by this app.
If you don\'t need this quide, please use Help section to turn if off. This menu will also allow you to rerun our guide again. You can select all guide or sub guides for each screen independelly
In order to interact with garden you are currently in, please select its name from the list.

This screen is used to interact with the garden. When you press next, application will start to play music and listen for signals comming from transmitters located in this location. Next time all that will start automaticaly.
This object will show you current status os the scanner. It can present informations such as scanning, playing or paused. It also tells you when you find all transmitters for selected location.
Use this button to stop current sounds or replay last track. Dark background indicates that button is currently disabled and cannot be used
Use this button to pause or start current sounds.
When scanner indicator show you that no more transmiters exists for this location, you can use this button to reset location and use transmitters once again.
Same buttons can be found on the control bar displayed when application work in background or when device screen is locked.
